name: Split Abilities
description:
A game where two siblings go into a dungeon and have to solve puzzles by strategically dividing their abilities between themselves. Once an ability is assigned to a character, that ability is stuck with them until the end of the level.

WASD and Arrow Keys move each character, respectively.

Get both characters to the stairs to beat the level.

To give a character the ability to press buttons, drag the Rock Sock to one of their inventory slots.

To give a character the ability to push boxes, drag the shove glove to one  of their inventory slots.

pressing escape opens a pause menu where you can reset the level if you get stuck.

If things look weird, try switching to/from fullscreen. Sometimes the game seems look better with it on, and sometimes with it off. This only happens in Itch, for some reason.

Coding: UwertaDev and PlayToTroll

Art: MeMeDumDum

Music: Ferkeshu
